articles.title: Liberals formally abandon net zero by 2050 but Ley says reaching target would still be ‘welcome outcome’
articles.description: Future Coalition government would not withdraw from Paris climate agreement altogether, Liberal frontbench decides a day after five-hour party room debateFollow our Australia news live blog for latest updatesGet our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcastLiberal leader Sussan Ley has defended the Liberal plan to dump legislated pledges for net zero and renewable energy while claiming to be committed to the Paris agreement, saying “I can deal with that” if she faces criticism for backsliding on climate targets.
articles.content: Future Coalition government would not withdraw from Paris climate agreement altogether, Liberal frontbench decides a day after five-hour party room debateFollow our Australia news live blog for latest updatesGet our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcastLiberal leader Sussan Ley has defended the Liberal plan to dump legislated pledges for net zero and renewable energy while claiming to be committed to the Paris agreement, saying “I can deal with that” if she faces criticism for backsliding on climate targets.

articles.title: News Corp Australia chair says outlets not part of climate crisis ‘denial machine’

articles.title: Amid Japan’s surge in bear attacks, a torrent of AI-generated videos is adding to anxiety
articles.description: Videos show schoolgirls fighting off animals, while others show people feeding bears, with some so realistic that users struggled to distinguish between fact and fictionIf a record number of fatal bear attacks wasn’t terrifying enough, experts say a torrent of AI-generated videos in Japan purporting to show people in close encounters with the animals is only adding to public anxiety – and could put people at greater risk.
